S.FORM: babaledaw sa lebulebud ku babaledaw i umaumahan. siwkay nu babaledaw u kulit nu babaledaw a kidu sa, u landaway atu makulahay. sapilimet i liwliw , u midiputay a kulit . mukan tu nipaluma' ku babaledaw, sisa mabidang ku malukay tu babaledaw. itawya, tuduhen ikiken nu malukay ku babaledaw, bangsis a'su tu. hali mukan tu niyazu'ay a tademaw. mibabaledaw mibabaledaw kaku i umaumahan nacila. sibabaledawan sibabaledaw ku umah ni Kacaw. u sulit nu Amilika Locusts are certain species of short horned grasshoppers in the family Acrididae that have a swarming phase. These insects are usually solitary, but under certain circumstances, become more abundant and change their behaviour and habits, becoming gregarious. No taxonomic distinction is made between locust and grasshopper species; the basis for the definition is whether a species forms swarms under intermittently suitable conditions. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Sakizaya binacadan a sukudad Yincumincu weiyuanhuy ipabaw nu calay a sukudad nasulitan nay paybalucu'ay a kawaw nu subana'ay a pu 2018 1, nasulitan ni Tuku Sayun
